---
title: "KMeans"
author: "Wim van der Ham"
output: html_document
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(broom)

iris_df <- as_data_frame(iris)

iris_train <- iris_df %>% 
  select(-Species)

kclust <- kmeans(iris_train, 2)

iris_pred <- augment(kclust, iris)
iris_pred %>%
  count(Species, `.cluster`)
```



```{r}
library(mokken)
data(acl)

Communality <- acl[, 1:10]

scale <- aisp(Communality, verbose = FALSE)
scale

Communality_t <- t(Communality)

kclust <- kmeans(Communality_t, 3)
kclust

Communality_pred <- augment(kclust, Communality_t)
```
